name: FlipPix Travel - Germany
description:
Brought to you by popular demand, FlipPix Travel – Germany’s beautiful castles, winding rivers and scenic villages meander through both well known destinations and quiet corners. If you’ve never been to Germany, you’ll be making your travel plans and if you’ve seen it before, you’ll want to go back! FlipPix Travel – Germany has 12 scenes with 240 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed for both phones and tablets.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
